ModMetaData.name: Pick Up at Home (Fork)
ModMetaData.author: cedaro, b0unt9
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Pick Up At Home (1.6 Update)[/h1] This is a [b]reimplementation[/b] of the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2982694750]original "Pick Up At Home" mod[/url] for RimWorld, updated to support [b]version 1.6[/b].
In RimWorld 1.5, the original mod added a Float Menu option via [b]Harmony patching[/b], allowing pawns to manually pick up items within player-controlled home maps. However, as of RimWorld 1.6, this functionality can now be added using the [b]native `[u]FloatMenuOptionProvider[/u]` system[/b], which this mod takes full advantage of.
‚ö†Ô∏è Version 1.5 still requires Harmony! [hr][/hr]
[h2]‚úÖ Features[/h2] [list] [*] Adds a [b]Float Menu option[/b] when right-clicking on haulable items within player home maps. [*] Allows selected pawns to [b]manually pick up items[/b] into their inventory. [*] Takes into account: [list] [*] Pawn encumbrance limits [*] Path reachability [*] Stack count and partial pickups (slider dialog included) [/list] [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]üì¶ Differences from the Original Mod[/h2] [list] [*] [b]No Harmony patching[/b] is used ‚Äî all functionality is built using RimWorld 1.6's [b]native modding API[/b]. [*] Refactored and cleaned up logic for better compatibility with the new FloatMenu system. [*] Fully compatible with other FloatMenuOptionProviders in 1.6. [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]üìå Notes[/h2] [list] [*] This is [b]not an official update[/b] by the original author. [*] This version was rebuilt by reviewing and understanding the original mod‚Äôs functionality, then adapting it using new 1.6 tools. [*] The mod should be safe to use in existing saves, but always back up your game just in case. [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]üìú Credits[/h2] [list] [*] Original mod by [b][url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/CedarO/]Cedar[/url][/b] ([url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2982694750]Workshop page[/url]) [*] 1.6 update and native FloatMenu integration by [b][url=https://github.com/b0unt9]Bounty[/url][/b] [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]üîß Compatibility[/h2] [list] [*] RimWorld 1.6+ [*] Likely incompatible with the original mod (disable one or the other) [*] Compatible with most other mods unless they interfere with inventory or FloatMenu logic [/list] [hr][/hr]
[h2]üí¨ Feedback[/h2] Issues or suggestions? Feel free to leave a comment or contact me via GitHub: [url=https://github.com/rw-mod/Pick-Up-at-Home]github.com/rw-mod/Pick-Up-at-Home[/url] [hr][/hr]
